pullRequest.title: Setup predefined networks to configure defaults for multiple options
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Sets up the --network CLI arg so that instead of only defining constants it can set the defaults for multiple arguments (e..g boot nodes) which can then be overridden by their specific options if needed.
This will make it simpler for users to connect to well known networks (e.g. ./teku --network topaz).

commit.message: Setup predefined networks to configure defaults for multiple options.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into network-config

nodes.bodyText: This can only be a path right?  Should we just go ahead and make it a Path or at least rename the variable?

commit.message: Restore ability to specify constants as a file or URL using --network.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into network-config
